collectible.title: Reinforced Charm
collectible.subtitle: A gift from Yuelia!
collectible.text: This Reinforced Charm is said to bring good luck to those who wear it. Yuelia has grown rather close to Rin, and this is the gift she gave her, in order to counter her bad luck!
collectible.unlock: Be hugged by Yuelia twice in the same game.

collectible.text: Probably one of her best paintings of another person yet. Hisao's is a close second.
